translation: But those men of virtuous deeds, whose sins have come to an end and who are freed from the delusion of the pairs of opposites, worship Me steadfastly, with their vows.
commentary: 7.28 whose of whom? You but? Antagatam is at the end? Papam sin? of men of men? of men of virtuous deeds? And they? freed from the delusion of the pairs of opposites? Bhajante worship?
